column1: Advanced Health and Care Management (Innovation and Transformation) MSc
column5: Advanced Health and Care Management Course OverviewDo you want to play a key role in the transformation of health and care systems? Do you want to challenge the status quo and use your innovative ideas to develop systems and services that benefit both the patient and organisation?The Advanced Health and Care Management course is designed to better equip middle and senior managers within health and social care systems in the UK and globally, to lead transformational change and drive innovation within healthcare systems, processes and technologies.
column7: Please visit our website for the Advanced Health and Care Management (Innovation and Transformation) course fee information.
